methods.name: speak
methods.docs: Starts the TTS engine and plays the desired text.

methods.name: getSupportedLanguages
methods.docs: Returns a list of supported BCP 47 language tags.

methods.name: getSupportedVoices
methods.docs: Returns a list of supported voices.

methods.name: isLanguageSupported
methods.docs: Checks if a specific BCP 47 language tag is supported.

methods.name: openInstall
methods.docs:
Verifies proper installation and availability of resource files on the system.

Only available for Android.

properties.name: text
properties.docs: The text that will be synthesised when the utterance is spoken.

properties.name: lang
properties.docs:
The language of the utterance.
Possible languages can be queried using `getSupportedLanguages`.

Default: `en-US`.

properties.name: rate
properties.docs:
The speed at which the utterance will be spoken at.

Default: `1.0`.

properties.name: pitch
properties.docs:
The pitch at which the utterance will be spoken at.

Default: `1.0`.

properties.name: volume
properties.docs:
The volume that the utterance will be spoken at.

Default: `1.0`.

properties.name: voice
properties.docs:
The index of the selected voice that will be used to speak the utterance.
Possible voices can be queried using `getSupportedVoices`.

Only available for Web.

properties.name: category
properties.docs:
Select the iOS Audio session category.
Possible values: `ambient` and `playback`.
Use `playback` to play audio even when the app is in the background.

Only available for iOS.

Default: `ambient`.

interfaces.name: SpeechSynthesisVoice
interfaces.docs: The SpeechSynthesisVoice interface represents a voice that the system supports.

properties.name: default
properties.docs: Specifies whether the voice is the default voice for the current app (`true`) or not (`false`).

properties.name: lang
properties.docs:
BCP 47 language tag indicating the language of the voice.
Example: `en-US`.

properties.name: localService
properties.docs: Specifies whether the voice is supplied by a local (`true`) or remote (`false`) speech synthesizer service.

properties.name: name
properties.docs:
Human-readable name that represents the voice.
Example: `Microsoft Zira Desktop - English (United States)`.

properties.name: voiceURI
properties.docs:
Type of URI and location of the speech synthesis service for this voice.
Example: `urn:moz-tts:sapi:Microsoft Zira Desktop - English (United States)?en-US`.
